thread.section_title: Vacation Rental Pros Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vacation Rental Pros | vacationrentalpros.com
thread.title: John
thread.title_full: Vacation Rental Pros reviewed by John

author: John
title: John
text: We've used Vacation Rental Pros 6 times since 2014. The properties we've rented were as-advertised or better. The customer service folks were very patient and professional over the phone to help select the right property. I've had very few complaints, but when I had one it was addressed immediately.
